sense.def:
Kadar človek
perceives something
, vidi, opazi nekaj ali se zave nečesa, zlasti česa takega, kar ni očitno.

seg.quote: Many insects can perceive colours that are invisible to us.
They failed to perceive that this was what I objected to.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
perceives someone or something as being or doing a particular thing
, misli, da je tista oseba ali dogajanje resnično tako, kot je videti.

seg.quote: It is important that the president be perceived as moving the country forward.
